list_definition.mean_english: hệ thống liên lạc giữa hai bộ phận
list_definition.definition: a system of communication within an aeroplane, factory etc, usually by means of microphones and loudspeakers

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The pilot spoke to the passengers over the intercom.
